text: [Music]
hi I'm njma from the account access
management team at the AWS office in
Cape Town today I'll explain how size
flexible Amazon ec2 reserved incenses or
RIS apply to your AWS pill let's get
started size flexible RIS can apply to
any usage within a particular ec2
instance family no matter the instant
size this usage provides you with the
flexibility to apply your RIS to match
your compute needs here are a few
examples on how size flexible RIS work
if you purchase an R for an m5x large
instance that R also applies to usage of
m5. large instances multiple smaller RIS
can combine to apply to a larger instant
size for example suppose you purchase
two RIS for m5. large instances those
two RIS can then apply towards the usage
of an m5x large
instance if you have multiple accounts
under a Consolidated billing set up then
note that there are additional
qualifications to understand about how
those RIS apply across the organization
you can find more details about that in
the repost article Linked In the video
descript description so now you know how
size flexible Amazon ec2 reserved
instances or RIS apply to your aw
SP thanks for watching and happy cloud
computing from all of us here at AWS
[Music]
